home.subtitle: Mechatronics, Automation and Robotics student at

about.title: About me
about.description: My name is Clément Charbonnel, I am 21 years old and a second-year engineering student at {ense3-link}. My studies focus on mechatronics, automation, and robotics. Outside of the school, I am passionate about mechanics, DIY, computer science, and sports. Thanks to my passions, I love starting new {projects-link} to develop my skills and learn new things. But I always need a bit of tennis, rugby, or cycling to relax!

contact.title: Get in touch!
contact.footerNote: I'm currently looking for a robotics internship for summer 2025!
